# Chen's Gallery

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(magrittr)
library(magick)
```

The goal of Chen's Gallery is to showcase all art pieces on a single website.

```{r image}
magick::image_read(path = '/Users/chris/r_programming/chensgallery/static/img/WhatsApp Image 2020-11-22 at 12.39.22 (2).jpeg') %>% 
  magick::image_trim() %>% 
  magick::image_scale("600x400")
```
